info.author: Ben Hayden
info.description: gtkdynacons (module in tarball) is a dynamic 2D cons list. benterm starts with one term and draggable handles on the bottom and right edges. when you drag those handles, terms are dynamically created in the new space, along with more draggable handles.
info.name: benterm
info.summary: terminal emulator using pygtk and vte
info.html_description: gtkdynacons (module in tarball) is a <b>dyna</b>mic 2D <b>cons</b> list. benterm starts with one term and draggable handles on the bottom and right edges. when you drag those handles, terms are dynamically created in the new space, along with more draggable handles.
